> Cheetara,Shadow Panther, and Tripredacus Agent are waiting for panthos to
> step down waiting to annihilate him if he doesnt fix what he did.
>
> The base surprises panthos with firing some turret shots at him.
>

{Panthos}

    The shots wing off the bots shoulder, gouging lines across his armor as
he adjusts his course, no longer heading straight down to meet his welcoming
committee below, his angled course guiding him more towards the north side
of the bases outer face, shifting as more fire heads his way accepting the
stinging hits as a plan finalizes in his mind.

    ~Computer, change designation and transformation sequence, alter
frequency to Maximal typical signal~

    Inside himself the computer churns changing his designation from
predicon to maximal as his feet come down upon the ground.

    "Panthos maximize!" The robot hunched over once more assuming his
panther mode and prepared to spring for the brush to head north...
